law.catch_line: The Board of Public Works, upon the recommendation of the Secretary, may award a loan to an owner of...
law.text:
The Board of Public Works, upon the recommendation of the Secretary, may award a loan to an owner of an underground storage tank to cover the following costs:
Tank upgrade or replacement costs necessary to meet the technical requirements of regulations adopted by the Environmental Protection Agency for underground storage tanks;
Costs of site assessment after the upgrade or replacement is completed to determine eligibility for insurance, not to exceed $3,000; and
Costs of any additional apparatus necessary to bring the underground storage tank system into compliance with other State and federal requirements.
